DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To analyze association sexual function men spinal cord injury possible predictive factor dysfunction .
DOC.brief_title: Predictive Factors Male Sexual Dysfunction After Traumatic Spinal Cord Injury
DOC.detailed_description: Method : Observational study ( CAAE 41221414.5.0000.5208 ) conduct 45 men , mean age 34 ( CI 31.5 37.1 ) , spinal cord injury active sex life . Sexual function assess International Index Erectile Function level degree injury determine follow guideline International Standards Neurological Functional Examination Classification Spinal Cord Injury . Descriptive statistical technique apply multivariate analysis use logistic regression adjust observe association factor , 0.05 significance level .
DOC.criteria: clinical diagnosis traumatic spinal cord injury , injury time le six month heterosexual sexually active patient erectile dysfunction attribute endocrine metabolic disease order , underwent surgery genital area , radical prostatectomy penile implant cognitive impairment
